Entries.Island_willy_rescue: Are you okay? I found you washed up on the shore, {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/ElderAntiquatedNoun}} }} }}.$s.$s#$b#You really had me worried... I thought you were a goner! Be a little more careful out there...$s#$b#The island can be a dangerous place.
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_PlayerMale: You were gone so long I started to get worried about you! I almost had a heart attack when I saw your limp body...$s
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_PlayerFemale: You were gone so long I started to get worried about you! I almost had a heart attack when I saw your limp body...$a
Entries.Morris_CommunityDevelopmentForm_PlayerMa: $q -1 -1#I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/ServiceFormalNoun}} }} }}. Care to take a look?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes#$r -1 -1 No#No
Entries.Morris_CommunityDevelopmentForm_PlayerFe: $q -1 -1#I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/ServiceFormalNoun}} }} }}. Care to take a look?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes#$r -1 -1 No#No

Changes.LogName: Fix ExtraDialogue - Modded Dialogue + Custom Pronouns - Plural
